name: Lemonade Stand (Thoughtless Labs)
description:
Run your very own Lemonade Stand!

Your nine year old entrepreneur, Caleb. Your parents have just given you $100 to get your empire off the ground. Do you have what it takes to succeed?

Gameplay

The name of the game is simple; make the best lemonade around and sell it for profit. 

  • Buy your inventory
  • Perfect your recipe
  • Set your price

Don't forget to check the weather forecast though!

Special thanks to @gruber_music for help with making this game sound great!
